properties.areaDesc: Lowndes, AL; Montgomery, AL; Elmore, AL; Dallas, AL; Autauga, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:18AM CST until February 19 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Alabama River At Montgomery...

.Heavy rainfall from last week continues to produce rises on the
Alabama River at Montgomery, and a Flood Warning remains in effect.
However, water levels continue to drop, and the current forecast
this morning has Montgomery dropping below flood stage by Tuesday
afternoon. Therefore, the warning will remain in effect until at
least that time.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Alabama River At Montgomery.
* until late Tuesday night...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT  8:00 AM Monday the stage was 36.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 35 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
tomorrow early afternoon .
* Impact...At 35 feet...Extensive flooding of low lands in the area
occurs.
* Impact...At 26 feet...Some flooding of low lying areas and
secondary roads begins in the Montgomery area. Flooding of the golf
course at Maxwell Air Force Base and portions of River Road occurs
at stages around 30 feet and higher.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
